title: Weekend Roundup: Dirt Fund #Senditforward, Ride 100 miles to Win, Bike to Ski & more!
content:
The DirtFund Project aims to #Senditforward, supporting privateer racers – We’re more than a tiny bit partial on this one here at Bikerumor (more on that in a second). But we love the idea of supporting grassroots racers looking to step up to the next level. Established just last November by Daniel O’Shea and “a […]

The post Weekend Roundup: Dirt Fund #Senditforward, Ride 100 miles to Win, Bike to Ski & more! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
